meanings.definition: The action of defining something again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The redefinition of the word 'love' helped me understand it better.
meanings.sent2: The redefinition of the company's goals brought clarity to our mission.
meanings.sent3: His constant redefinition of the rules of the game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The redefinition of success as a journey rather than a destination was eye-opening.
meanings.sent5: The redefinition of beauty as inner strength resonated with many people.

meanings.definition: The process of giving a new meaning to something.
meanings.sent1: The redefinition of 'friendship' in the story was heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The redefinition of 'tradition' sparked a lively debate in the community.
meanings.sent3: Her whimsical redefinition of 'time' as a mischievous cat made us smile.
meanings.sent4: The redefinition of 'success' as a dance rather than a race was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The redefinition of 'courage' as a quiet strength left a lasting impression.
